sentences.en: ...high-energy laser beams.
sentences.cn: …高能激光束。

sentences.en: "Welcome back," she beamed.
sentences.cn: “欢迎回来，”她笑容满面地说。

sentences.en: a laser beam
sentences.cn: 激光束

sentences.en: Even with the lights on full beam I couldn't see very far.
sentences.cn: 即使把灯打到了最强光我还是看不了多远。

sentences.en: Everything she says is a little off beam.
sentences.cn: 她的话全都不大靠谱。

sentences.en: Fix the beam with the brackets and screws.
sentences.cn: 把横梁用托架和螺丝固定。

sentences.en: Frances beamed at her friend with undisguised admiration.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝用毫不掩饰的羡慕的神情朝她的朋友们绽开了笑容。

sentences.en: He directed the tiny beam of light at the roof.
sentences.cn: 他把那一小束光对准了屋顶。

sentences.en: He was suddenly caught in the full beam of a searchlight.
sentences.cn: 他突然被探照灯照中而暴露无遗.

sentences.en: His answer was on the beam.
sentences.cn: 他的答案正确.

sentences.en: She froze when the beam of the flashlight struck her.
sentences.cn: 当手电筒的光照到她身上时她僵住了。

sentences.en: Sherman looked at his sons and beamed proudly.
sentences.cn: 谢尔曼看着儿子们，自豪地笑着。

sentences.en: Suddenly the beam of an electric torch was flashed into his face.
sentences.cn: 忽然一道手电光射到他脸上.

sentences.en: the beam of a powerful flashlight
sentences.cn: 手电筒的一道强光

sentences.en: The ceilings are supported by oak beams.
sentences.cn: 天花板由橡木横梁支撑着。

sentences.en: The cottage had exposed oak beams.
sentences.cn: 小屋的橡木梁裸露着。

sentences.en: the first sports broadcast to be beamed across the Atlantic
sentences.cn: 首次向大西洋彼岸播送的体育节目

sentences.en: The gymnast performed on the balance beam with an easy grace.
sentences.cn: 体操运动员在平衡木上表演得优美自如.

sentences.en: The gymnast poised herself on the balance beam.
sentences.cn: 体操运动员在平衡木上保持平衡.

sentences.en: The lighthouse beam was quite distinct in the gathering dusk.
sentences.cn: 灯塔的光束在渐浓的暮色中清晰可见。

sentences.en: The load on this beam is more than it will bear.
sentences.cn: 横梁上的负荷比它能承受的要大得多.

sentences.en: The radar beam can track a number of targets almost simultaneously.
sentences.cn: 雷达波几乎可以同时追着多个目标.

sentences.en: The sun beamed through the clouds.
sentences.cn: 阳光穿透了云层。

sentences.en: This beam bears the whole weight of the upper floor.
sentences.cn: 这根大梁承受了上面那一层的全部重量.

sentences.en: This strut braces the beam.
sentences.cn: 这根柱子支撑房梁.

words.tran_cn: 喜气洋洋的；愉快的；光亮的；耀眼的
光亮的；船身宽大的；象梁一样的
发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露

phrases.tran_cn: （与他人相比）自身特别重大的缺点
n. 平衡木；天平横梁；平衡杆，秤杆
光束；线偏振光束；直接光线
正确：在正确轨道上；行为端正的
(北美)把车前灯的远光调为近光
n. （蒸汽机的）步进梁；活动梁

trans.tran_cn: 光线，波束，梁，平衡木，笑容
trans.tran_en: a long heavy piece of wood or metal used in building houses, bridges etc
to send out a line of light, heat, energy etc
to send a radio or television signal through the air, especially to somewhere very distant

trans.tran_cn: 面露喜色； 定向发出， 播送
trans.tran_en: to send a radio or television signal through the air, especially to somewhere very distant
